text: Vila Olímpia is a train station on CPTM Line 9-Emerald, located in the district of Itaim Bibi in São Paulo. ==History== The station was built by CPTM, during the "South Line Dinamization" project, opened on 23 March 2001. It is locatede in Vila Olímpia, next to Lift Station of Metropolitan Company of Water and Energy. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2001
title: Vila Olímpia (CPTM)
